title: I'm having a problem with my one-month-old pixel 3 a shutting off and not booting back up.
content: Google pixel 3 day is crashing and not booting back up with the power button. I had to plug it in and hold the side buttons to get it to work. Really worried this is a mass problem with all the holiday phones sold cover the Cyber week.I'll see you in a couple hour post similar to mine. Is Google having a mass problem with their phones?
